name: Airblade
text: Chain. Remove 1 struggle.

name: Backstab
text: Stealth. When you overrun the monster, you may discard this card from your hand to deal 4 damage.

name: Blade Charge
text: Your weapon gets +2 damage until the end of this turn.

name: Blade Rush
text: When you suffer ≋, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately overrun the monster and deal 2 damage.

name: Crescent Strike
text: Chain. Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Cross Over
text: When you discard this card from your hand to generate stamina for a movement, you may overrun the monster instead of moving. If you do, remove 1 struggle.

name: Cut Through
text: You may immediately overrun the monster. If you do, draw 1.

name: Dance Step
text: Draw 1. If you draw a ⚔ this way, draw 1 additional card.

name: Dancing
text: Draw 1 for each ⚔ in your sequence (max draw: 3). ✂: Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Dancing Shield
text: Chain. This card counts as ⚔ for battle dance and retaliate.

name: Deny
text: When you reveal an attrition card, you may discard this card from your hand to discard that attrition card and reveal another one instead.

name: Disengage
text: When the monster changes its orientation, you may discard this card from your hand to draw up to your hand size limit.

name: Divert
text: Assist. When a behavior card is revealed, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately overrun the monster.

name: Double Strike
text: This card counts as ⚔⚔ for battle dance. ✂: Draw 1.

name: Echoing Blades
text: Draw 2 and then discard a card from your hand.

name: Endless Strike
text: Assist. Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Evasive Dance
text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 ⚔ and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Fade
text: Stealth. ✂: Draw 1 and increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Fighting Spirit
text: You may suffer ≋. If you do, draw 2 or remove 2 struggle.

name: Finesse
text: Draw 1. ✂: Draw 2 instead.

name: Halfmoon
text: Assist. Deal your weapon damage and draw 1.

name: Iron Hedge
text: When you would suffer ≋, you may discard this card from your hand to halve that damage and draw 1.

name: Lightning Strike
text: If the top card of your discard pile is a ⚔, you may play that card as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Maelstrom
text: ⚔⚔: The next time you deal damage through battle dance this turn, double that damage.

name: Natural Agility
text: Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn. ⚔: Draw 1.

name: Offensive Attitude
text: When another player plays a ⚔ in their sequence, you may discard this card from your hand to search your deck for a ⚔ and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Outweigh
text: Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn. ✂: Draw 1.

name: Overture
text: If you paid with a ⚔, draw 3.

name: Perfection
text: Draw 1. If that card is a ⚔, you may play it as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Piercing Strike
text: Chain. You may immediately overrun the monster.

name: Reactive Defense
text: When you suffer ≋, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately overrun the monster and draw 1.

name: Returning Blade
text: Assist. Reclaim: ⚔⚔⚔.

name: Rising Moon
text: You may draw 1 or increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1. ✂: Your weapon gets +1 damage until the end of this turn for each card with stealth in your sequence.

name: Run Through
text: You may immediately overrun the monster.

name: Scythe
text: Assist. Chain. Remove 1 struggle.

name: Shadow Step
text: Reclaim: ⚔⚔. You may immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Shadowstrike
text: Your cards gain stealth until the end of the turn. When you overrun the monster, you may discard this card from your hand to draw 2.

name: Slice
text: Assist. Chain ⚔.

name: Spinning
text: Chain ⚔. ⚔⚔: Gain a defense token.

name: Swing
text: Assist. Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Twin Blades
text: Chain ⚔. When you discard this card from your hand, deal your weapon damage.

name: Twist
text: Chain ⚔. Draw 1.

name: Unseen
text: Chain ⚔. Reclaim: Start your turn in the same sector as another player.

name: Wall of Blades
text: If you have 3 cards or more in your sequence, you can play this card without paying its stamina cost.
